title: From Our Home Correspondent 23/07/2017
content: Mishal Husain presents reports from Jersey as a childhood islander returns, from Birmingham's closing greyhound stadium, plus the reflections of an ex-children's television star.
contentSnippet: Mishal Husain presents reports from Jersey as a childhood islander returns, from Birmingham's closing greyhound stadium, plus the reflections of an ex-children's television star.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 4
itunes.subtitle: Grenfell Tower's locale, Swansea's drug roads, Jersey and a Brummie dog track all feature
